se.fredin.gravitation.entity

Interface Entity

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractEntity, BigBulletPowerup, Bullet, FasterBulletPowerup, FasterPlayerPowerup, LaunchPad, PhysicalEntity, Player, Powerup, ReverseBulletPowerup, ReversedStearingPowerup, SlowerBulletPowerup, SlowerPlayerPowerup

    public interface Entity
extends com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    A common interface that contains the main methods that all entities should have.
    Author:
    johan
